Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mandarin Orchard Singapore, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Takashimaya Shopping Centre and Paragon Shopping Centre. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Chinatown Heritage Center and Haji Lane.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 1077 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and shopping on site.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare, and shopping on site.
Make yourself at home in one of the 1077 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Mandarin Orchard Singapore, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Takashimaya Shopping Centre and Paragon Shopping Centre. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Chinatown Heritage Center and Haji Lane.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Takashimaya Shopping Centre - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Paragon Shopping Centre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Ngee Ann City - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Lucky Plaza - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Wisma Atria - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Mount Elizabeth Medical Center - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Orchard Road - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
ION Orchard - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Shaw Centre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Far East Plaza - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
DFS Galleria Singapore - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Royal Thai Embassy - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Orchard Tower - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Great World City Mall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Plaza Singapura - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Mandarin Orchard Singapore is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 18 km / 11.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show will be subject to 100% charge. Surcharge applies during peak periods. All rates not applicable to Singapore citizens / permanent residents. Non-refundable policy, no amendment or cancellation allowed once booking confirmed for the following periods: Christmas & Year End. Kindly be informed that our hotel guest rooms are equipped with free WiFi. With the start of Ramadan month from 16th May to 14th June 2018, In-room Dining will be offering Ramadan Set Breakfast (Sahur) for all our Muslim guest. Guest can contact Front-Office Team for details.
